NAME: Bolt Sword
DESCRIPTION: Inflict moderate lightning physical damage with your sword.

NAME: Aggressive Stance
DESCRIPTION: Increases your attack and luck, but reduces your defense. Does not skip your turn.

NAME: Ice Shield Strike
DESCRIPTION: Deal some physical ice damage to an enemy and get a shield for 20% your MAXHP.

NAME: Defensive Stance
DESCRIPTION: Increases your physical and magical defense, but reduces your attack. Does not skip your turn.

NAME: Pyroclasm
DESCRIPTION: Deal physical and magical fire damage to an enemy, while healing for half of the damage done. Recover some MP.

NAME: Champion's Roar
DESCRIPTION: Remove all your debuffs. Grants a shield for 30% of your MAXHP.
